title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex has now openly named the 5 friends who spoke anonymously on her behalf to People magazine. Do you think they will be called to testify in court about whether Meghan knew they were talking to People magazine? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I read on another thread, a very astute poster remarked how odd it was that she was able to name each and every one of these anonymous friends given she had no knowledge at all of the upcoming article and they spoke without her knowledge.. Excellent spot. Also how did these five anonymous contributors-without-her-permission even manage to contribute to a magazine article detailing a letter they knew nothing about - Yanno as it was so private between M and her father? I would like to say I was a little shocked at the content of M’s claims in the latest revelations in her court case against MoS - but I’d be lying…and I wouldn’t be the only one! So just for a laugh let’s chore through the latest. Meghan believes her wedding to Prince Harry in Windsor in 2018 generated £1billion in tourism revenueOf course she does, what Disney Princess, living the dream believes otherwise? Doesn’t every country base its economic growth on a royal marriage? I suppose we should be grateful she didn’t fall asleep for a hundred years…where would we end up?The Duchess pointed out Princesses Beatrice and Eugenie and Prince Michael 'undertake paid work' as royals.Yes, this is true. However absolutely none of them have expressed a desire to run for public office, wear their underwear outside a spandex body suit and fight intergalactic baddies in a blockbuster movie, strive for Global domination or run for office while simultaneously changing the world.Meghan denied saying in the letter that she felt her father had 'victimised' her and she had 'only one father'She is a professional victim. She was born victimised. Is there something she’s not telling us here? Has she another father somewhere?She wrote the letter to stop him being 'manipulated' by the Press, rather than 'an attempt at reconciliation'Would it not have been a better idea to speak out against the press intrusion Thomas was enduring - as Harry did for Doria and Meghan - when it happened? They didn’t though. If she admits not to attempt a reconciliation via letter why write it in painstaking script, copy it and give the gist -if not the letter itself - to the anonymous ones, months later? A stick to poke the bear perhaps? Thomas sat on that emotionally manipulative letter for months before seeing the People article.Meghan spent her own money on flights for her father to and from to London and his hotel for her weddingAnd she spent a lot more of other people’s money on flights for her own gratification. Big deal, Meg - your father spent untold money turning you into the ungrateful, selfish brat you are today - you seriously think a flight and a hotel for your own father is worth griping about. Is she after a refund?😂The Duchess felt 'unprotected' by the 'institution' of the Royal Family and was prevented from defending herself, which left her friends 'rightly concerned for her welfare, specifically as she was pregnant'.Seriously? Meghan enjoyed one of the most indolent gestations in living memory within the r/f. Who left her unprotected? The r/f with the choices of properties? The taxpayer who still can see the bill for the previous tax year and is looking forward to the next? Are we to believe this ‘strong independent’ woman suddenly changed into a slobbering heap of snot and neurotic episodes because the Palace wasn’t doing enough to defend her? I think they did an admirable job given what they had to work with and the high turnover of her staff - much of what has transpired since they left the protection of the palace polishers was hidden while she was in the fold. As for her mental health? Lol, lol, lol. I feel a claim coming on here.

I think that there is only slim chance her friends won’t be called to testify. Meghan, or at least her legal team, knows it and they do everything in their power to stop it. Thomas Markle sold that letter to defend himself against what Meghan’s friend told to People magazine. Aside from finding some diary where Thomas wrote about his intention to publish that letter, she will never be able to prove, that he would have done it. The judge will want to know why her friends share information about that letter, if Meghan asked them to do it and more. I would question how it is possible for her friends chose the same tabloid around the same time or why they did it anonymously, because if you want to support and defend your friend you should just do it, not hide as some anonymous source. The same goes with Meghan, I would question her, because there is no way she didn’t know who spoke to press, because even if she has hundreds friends, there can’t be that many that she talks every day or with whom she shared content of that letter. You wouldn’t speak about your problems with your dad with everyone. My opinion is that the only reason why Meghan is trying to “protect” her friends from testifying and wants the court to let them stay anonymous, is because she is afraid that she could lose. Her friends wouldn’t want to be dragged into some legal battle and possibly say that they spoke with press when they fight against it (don’t forget that most of Meghan’s friend are kind of famous). Moreover, don’t forget that Meghan was against her father speaking with press and suddenly she would be OK with her friends doing the same? She would have to stop speaking with them publicly. The funny thing is that her friends should be protected, because they are private people, according to Meghan, but when her father was attacked because of her relationship with Harry, she did nothing. She let press talk about him in vicious way and didn’t even blink, but when they attacked her, suddenly there had to be some statement and whatever. Her father is private citizen, who did nothing wrong in that situation, only his daughter started dating prince. Yes, he later used press (or more like press used him) and let them take photos of him reading books about UK, but what else could he do? Imagine how he felt – his daughter was planning her second wedding and he didn’t even meet his future-son-in-law. There could be some phono calls and text messages (that Harry and Meghan later published), but was it enough? I wouldn’t listen to some prince that could only write me messages about not talking to press, when he did nothing to defend me and couldn’t be even bothered to visit me. It’s not like Meghan and Harry eloped after two weeks knowing each other, there was definitely time to visit her dad (maybe instead of going to Africa and more). So if Meghan thinks that her friends should be protected, why didn’t she do the same for her dad? She just didn’t care and suddenly it’s her who is heartbroken. When she heard about her dad having heart-attack, she did nothing – why couldn’t she just use private jet to visit him? I would drop everything for my dad and based on how nice Meghan spoke about her dad before Harry, I would expect her to do the same. Meghan used that letter to manipulate the public, because you don’t keep copy of letters without an ulterior motive. Moreover, her new friend Omid Scobi, that amazing author of Meghan and Harry’s biography, said something really interesting: “While the purpose of Meghan’s letter was very much to repair the relationship with the father, she knew in her heart of heart’s that this was going to be released to the papers. Thomas has a record of this. This is exactly the man she knows. So, many of those things in that letter were written with the public in mind. She very much wanted to set the record straight.” He said it last year, but I would expect someone like him to only share what he knows is truth. Or for Meghan to not work with someone who tells lies about her. I really hope that Daily mail will use this information, because either Meghan admits that she wrote it for public (and show that her lawsuit is kind of pointless) or says that Omid lied and with that she will only confirm that Finding home is full of lies. Oh, what situation. Meghan wants the legal battle be only about breach of privacy, because she knows that her actions show that she wanted that letter be in public, or at least she let it happen. If she though her dad would it publish it, then she should visit him and talk with him, not send some letter that could be publish in tabloids. And in order to protect herself, she is going to try everything to help her win that case, like pointing stupid things out (it wasn’t her who brought that billion pounds into UK, but Harry, people cared about the fact that it was prince Harry’s wedding) or demand privacy for her friends and that they shouldn’t testify.

The case will only be determined by what is law and what can be proved. In the first hearing the Judge struck out quite a bit of Meghan,s claims as they were not relevant to the case. In the 2nd hearing the Judge decided that if a person (English law) goes to a newspaper and tells all and demands anonymity they can not be revealed. So the Judge had no choice in stating that the names of the five friends should for now stay private and un published. However when he was examining the times and dates when certain statements by Meghan team were filed at court, it was clear that someone on Meghan’s team was leaking part of the information in the court papers before the other party had received them. Meghan claimed that the newspaper was leaking information from the court documents. The Judge feels that is not the case but he wasn't deciding that point in the anonymity hearing. It is likely that if Meghan’s friends did disclose information to the press then had they done it before, did one of them disclose what was in the letter before her father did, it than case the court would want to hear their statements and or the defendant the newspaper could insist in cross examining the friends to find out whether Meghan knew they were ‘spilling the beans’ and it was all a set up. Meghan is not out of the water yet. The courts take a dim view of someone, whoever they are, of manipulating the system. Losing this case could be the last straw and would probably mean that Meghan would not return to the U.K. for any reason. Besides of course that Prince Charles would probably have to bail them out.

The imaginary five friends that she doesn’t want to disclose…she said the reason why is because they are private citizens….😂 It was ok for her friends to talk about Father Markle who is a private citizen living in Mexico…😯 No way these imaginary friends will turn up to court…it was suggested that one of these friend was Mulroney…that’s now unlikely as Mulroney is being blanked/ghosted and is thinking of writing a book about her friendship with markle to clear her name as a ‘bully and racist’. I’m sure Father markle did the same thing, documentary, interviews and publish the letter to clear his name. Just like markle got annoyed as the royal family didn’t allow her to respond to newspaper articles… Maybe she is just too famous…to do normal stuff with her son. Jolie Lopez were all fine…but markle is just too much jeez

Did you ever, in your wildest dreams, think you would look at a picture of this man and say 'He's a genius'?  Move over Nostradamus -Thomas Markle Jr. is coming through. 04/26/2018  I knew it. I knew she would start by saying [use a whiney/Valley Girl voice] ‘the Royal Family was so mean to me.’ Next she will say [same voice] 'they are mean to Archie because he's black'. Who am I kidding? Meghan the find your voice seat at the table rah rah rah independent feminist hasn't spoken a word. EVER. She is such a snake. She's a smart girl - she knows exactly what she is doing. But why? What is the end game? Her goal? She is playing a dangerous game. There are elderly family members on both sides of her family (even that one “she never had”). She will somehow make it about her. She is already practicing the perfect mourning face.  Other words of wisdom from Sir Thomas Markle Jr.  I'm late to the party. I'm just learning about this news. I'm surprised but not shocked by this. I've been busy being pissed off at protestors/looters and playing in the dirt.  Off topic - this is my new area on a hillside. My husband asked me what I wanted for my 60th BD and I said a big rock. He brought me 5. I'm such a diva.

She did not “openly” name them. The new legal documents showed that Meghan has now identified the five friends - who spoke anonymously - with the papers just referring to them as A, B, C, D and E, although she named them in a confidential section. I do think they will have to testify to the court as that is a basis of things. Funny how she knew which 5 friends spoke to People.

After reading all the comments following this question, I am absolutely torn. Part of me hopes that the Duchess will have to attend the law court in person and answer some serious questions but another part hopes she never sets foot in the UK again. She is too toxic for us to handle here, the US is welcome to her!

Maybe…. virtual testimonies , if the friends testify good and if they don’t ….good. Hopefully we can move on to another drama in the life of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex…… seems as if they are going to be forever on people’s minds….. remember that they aren’t popular?????

Another ploy by Meghan to keep her name in the news. Can she not retain a little bit of dignity? How on earth did she get the name of the so called ‘friends’’? Is Meghan Markle a nice person? Click on the link to read what she is really like.

I have not been following the court case that Meghan has against a British tabloid. I don’t know what the legal rules are in England about bringing similar past acts into evidence. I don’t know why she named these 5 friends if she and they had wished to remain anonymous.

I’m not aware that Meghan HAS openly named her five friends, but I also don’t know what they have to do with the case. Meghan is suing The Mail on Sunday from breach of copyright. It has nothing to do with her friends or People magazine.
Again, is this from the Q&As from the law suit? Where are they located on line? I would like to read them myself instead of this game of telephone.
